headline: Truist Securities Raises PT on Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (PANW) Following Strong Fiscal Q4 2025 Results
summary: With strong revenue growth and significant hedge fund interest, Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) secures a spot on our list of the 14 Best IT Stocks to Buy for the Long Term.
